itunes:title: 7/13/21: Global Chaos, Haiti Situation, Billionaire Space Race, Vaccine Surveillance, Child Tax Credit, White Liberals, White House Corruption, and More!

itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar discuss the chaos happening around the world as protests heat up, the political situation in Haiti, billionaires racing to space, the DNC's newest censorship campaign, effects of the child tax credit expansion, white liberals fueling the culture war, corruption in the Biden administration, wall street fleecing workers, and more!
